text: Koudou Laurent Gbagbo"Qui est Laurent Gbagbo ?" , FPI website . (Gagnoa Bété: ; ; born 31 May 1945) is an Ivorian politician who was the President of Côte d'Ivoire from 2000 until his arrest in April 2011. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Ivory Coast Category:Criminals
title: Laurent Gbagbo
